response.original_title: The Victoria Givens World Record Anal Gangbang
response.overview: This film chronicles an event held at a North Hollywood nightclub in Los Angeles, California, on October 23, 2004. Givens planned the event for months to break the record set in 1998 by Brooke Ashley in the film "World's Biggest Anal Gang Bang," in which she received 50 men. One hundred and ten fans of porn star Victoria Givens attended in person to participate. In addition, Givens set a new world sexual record by having anal sex with 101 men for seven hours without artificial lubrication.
response.tagline: 101 GUYS! 30 CUMSHOTS! NO LUBE! ONE VICTORIA
response.title: The Victoria Givens World Record Anal Gangbang
